TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PictureBox extends System.Windows.Forms.Control implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class PictureBox Inherits Control Implements ISupportInitialize
type PictureBox = class inherit Control interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示顯示影像用的 Windows 圖片方塊控制項。

span.span: Represents a Windows picture box control for displaying an image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常用來顯示點陣圖中繼檔、 圖示、 JPEG、 GIF 或 PNG 檔案的圖形。Typically the is used to display graphics from a bitmap, metafile, icon, JPEG, GIF, or PNG file. 設定屬性您想要顯示在設計階段或執行階段。Set the property to the you want to display, either at design time or at run time. 您也可以指定映像設定屬性並載入以同步方式使用的映像方法或使用以非同步方式方法。You can alternatively specify the image by setting the property and load the image synchronously using the method or asynchronously using the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果您想要在多個使用相同的映像控制項，為每個建立的映像複製。If you want to use the same image in multiple controls, create a clone of the image for each . 從多個控制項存取相同的映像就會發生例外狀況。Accessing the same image from multiple controls causes an exception to occur. 屬性，設定中的值為列舉型別，控制剪輯及顯示區域中的映像的位置。The property, which is set to values in the enumeration, controls the clipping and positioning of the image in the display area. 您可以變更顯示區域的大小，在執行階段使用屬性。You can change the size of the display area at run time with the property. 根據預設，所顯示控制項不會產生框線。By default, the control is displayed by without any borders. 您可以提供一般或 3d 框線使用屬性來區別圖片方塊從表單的其餘部分，即使它包含沒有映像。You can provide a standard or three-dimensional border using the property to distinguish the picture box from the rest of the form, even if it contains no image. 不是一個可選取的控制項，這表示它無法接收輸入的焦點。The is not a selectable control, which means that it cannot receive input focus. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何設定影像和調整圖片方塊的顯示區域的大小。The following code example illustrates how you can set an image and resize the display area of the picture box. 這個範例需要`ShowMyImage`現有表單，以及稱為命名空間已新增至表單的原始程式碼。This example requires that `ShowMyImage` is called in an existing form, and that the namespace has been added to the source code for your form. [!code-cpp[Classic PictureBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PictureBox Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PictureBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PictureBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PictureBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PictureBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表所顯示的是 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |項目Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||`null`| ||| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the and controls. 會藉由設定初始化和屬性使用和列舉型別，分別。The is initialized by setting the and properties using the and enumerations, respectively. 會填入 [範例圖片] 目錄中的圖片。The is populated with pictures from the Sample Pictures directory. 處理時，方法用事件控制項來決定是否選取項目。The method is used when handling the event of the control to determine whether an item is selected. 如果選取項目，則事件處理常式就會顯示選取的檔案設定屬性。If an item is selected, the event handler displays the selected file by setting the property. 這個範例會要求您擁有位於 C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents\My 圖片 \ 範例圖片目錄中的 JPG 檔案。The example requires that you have JPG files located in the C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents\My Pictures\Sample Pictures directory. 若要執行範例時，程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`InitializePictureBox`和`PopulateListView`表單的建構函式中的方法或事件處理方法。To run the example, paste the code into a form and call the `InitializePictureBox` and `PopulateListView` methods in the form's constructor or event-handling method. 確定所有事件與事件處理方法相關聯。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 指示控制項的框線樣式。

span.span: Indicates the border style for the control.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定這個屬性在設計階段或執行階段。You can specify this property at design time or run time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the and controls. 會藉由設定初始化和屬性使用和列舉型別，分別。The is initialized by setting the and properties using the and enumerations, respectively. 會填入 [範例圖片] 目錄中的圖片。The is populated with pictures from the Sample Pictures directory. 處理時，方法在用事件控制項來決定是否選取項目。The method is used in when handling the event of the control to determine whether an item is selected. 如果選取項目，則事件處理常式就會顯示選取的檔案設定屬性。If an item is selected, the event handler displays the selected file by setting the property. 這個範例會要求您擁有位於 C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents\My 圖片 \ 範例圖片目錄中的 JPG 檔案。The example requires that you have JPG files located in the C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents\My Pictures\Sample Pictures directory. 若要執行此範例中，將程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`InitializePictureBox`和`PopulateListView`表單的建構函式中的方法或事件處理方法。To run this example, paste the code into a form and call the `InitializePictureBox` and `PopulateListView` methods in the form's constructor or event-handling method. 確定所有事件與事件處理方法相關聯。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 取消非同步影像載入。

span.span: Cancels an asynchronous image load.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A影像是以非同步方式載入時屬性是`false`和方法用來載入影像。A image is loaded asynchronously when the property is `false` and the method is used to load the image. 如果負載而取消方法取消回報引發事件屬性設`true`。If a load is canceled with the method cancellation is reported by raising the event with the property of the set to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼包含在 Windows Form名為`pictureBox1`和兩個控制項名為`startLoadButton`和`cancelLoadButton`。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form that contains a named `pictureBox1` and two controls named `startLoadButton` and `cancelLoadButton`. 請確定按鈕的事件是在此範例中的事件處理方法相關聯。Make sure that the event for the buttons is associated with their event-handling method in this example. 您必須在您的系統上有效的路徑變更影像檔案路徑。You must change the image file path to a path that is valid on your system. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源； 表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release managed and unmanaged resources; to release unmanaged resources only.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需有關和，請參閱 [清理 Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 上和 [覆寫 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有指定，會顯示預設錯誤映像。If no is specified, a default error image is displayed.

summary.span: 取得或設定 顯示的影像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed by .
The to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定為要顯示的 。The property is set to the to display. 您可以在設計階段或執行階段。You can do this either at design time or at run time. > [!NOTE] > 如果您想要在多個使用相同的映像控制項，為每個建立的映像複製。If you want to use the same image in multiple controls, create a clone of the image for each . 從多個控制項存取相同的映像就會發生例外狀況。Accessing the same image from multiple controls causes an exception to occur. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在執行階段建立點陣圖，並顯示在藉由設定屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a bitmap at runtime and display it in a by setting the property. 若要執行此範例中，將它貼到 Windows Form 並呼叫`CreateBitmapAtRuntime`從表單的建構函式。To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form and call `CreateBitmapAtRuntime` from the form's constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.CreateBitmapAtRuntime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CreateBitmapAtRuntime/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.CreateBitmapAtRuntime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CreateBitmapAtRuntime/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定要在 中顯示之影像的路徑或 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the path or URL for the image to display in the .

value.span: 要在 中顯示之影像的路徑或 URL。

span.span: The path or URL for the image to display in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值可以是實際的路徑 (例如，"C:\SomeFolder\SomeSubFolder\Picture.jpg")、 相對路徑 ("\SomeSubFolder\Picture.jpg") 或 URL (http://contoso.com/images/Picture.jpg)。The property value can be an actual path (for example, "C:\SomeFolder\SomeSubFolder\Picture.jpg"), a relative path ("\SomeSubFolder\Picture.jpg"), or a URL (http://contoso.com/images/Picture.jpg). 如果使用相對路徑時，它會被視為與工作目錄。If a relative path is used, it will be considered relative to the working directory. 呼叫方法將覆寫屬性，並將方法呼叫中指定的 URL 值。A call to the method will overwrite the property, setting to the URL value specified in the method call.

summary.span: 將 設定為指定的 URL，並顯示所表示的影像。

span.span: Sets the to the specified URL and displays the image indicated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`url`參數指出本機檔案，建議的格式是本機檔案路徑。If the `url` parameter indicates a local file, the recommended format is a local file path. 例如，影像檔名為 myPicture.jpglocated atc: \ 會藉由傳遞存取**c:\myPicture.jpg**如`url`參數。For example, an image file named myPicture.jpglocated atc:\ would be accessed by passing **c:\myPicture.jpg** for the `url` parameter. 完整路徑，例如** http://www.contoso.com/path/images/image.jpg **，或相對路徑，例如 **./images/image.jpg**，可以使用。A full path, such as **http://www.contoso.com/path/images/image.jpg**, or a relative path, such as **./images/image.jpg**, can be used. 如果使用相對路徑時，它會被視為與工作目錄。If a relative path is used, it will be considered relative to the working directory. 呼叫方法會設定屬性設為值的`url`。A call to the method sets the property to the value of `url`.

span.span: is or an empty string.

exception.span: 參考不能在 Web 上存取的影像。

span.span: refers to an image on the Web that cannot be accessed.
refers to a file that is not an image.
refers to a file that does not exist.

summary.span: 非同步載入影像。

span.span: Loads the image asynchronously.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LoadAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 非同步載入影像。

span.span: Loads the image asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了呼叫方法，屬性必須設定為`false`來非同步載入影像。Besides calling the method, the property must be set to `false` to load an image asynchronously. 當您以非同步方式載入映像時，您可以處理事件，以判斷影像載入進度或事件，以判斷當影像載入已完成。When you load an image asynchronously, you can handle the event to determine the progress of an image load or the event to determine when an image load has completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LoadAsync(string url) cil managed

param.name: url
param.span: 要在 中顯示之影像的路徑。

span.span: The path for the image to display in the .

summary.span: 在指定的位置非同步載入影像。

span.span: Loads the image at the specified location, asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`url`參數指出本機檔案，建議的格式是本機檔案路徑。If the `url` parameter indicates a local file, the recommended format is a local file path. 例如，影像檔名為 myPicture.jpglocated atc: \ 會藉由傳遞存取**c:\myPicture.jpg**如`url`參數。For example, an image file named myPicture.jpglocated atc:\ would be accessed by passing **c:\myPicture.jpg** for the `url` parameter. 完整路徑，例如** http://www.contoso.com/path/images/image.jpg **，或相對路徑，例如 **./images/image.jpg**，可以使用。A full path, such as **http://www.contoso.com/path/images/image.jpg**, or a relative path, such as **./images/image.jpg**, can be used. 如果使用相對路徑時，它會被視為與工作目錄。If a relative path is used, it will be considered relative to the working directory. 呼叫方法會設定屬性設為值的`url`。A call to the method sets the property to the value of `url`. 呼叫方法會設定屬性設為值的`url`。A call to the method sets the property to the value of `url`. 除了呼叫方法，您必須設定屬性`false`來非同步載入影像。Besides calling the method, you must set the property to `false` to load an image asynchronously. 當您以非同步方式載入映像時，您可以處理事件，以判斷影像載入進度或事件，以判斷當影像載入已完成。When you load an image asynchronously, you can handle the event to determine the progress of an image load or the event to determine when an image load has completed. 如果非同步影像載入作業期間發生錯誤，會攔截它資料並回報屬性。If an error occurs during an asynchronous image-loading operation, it will be caught and reported by the property of the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼包含在 Windows Form名為`pictureBox1`和名為`startLoadButton`。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form that contains a named `pictureBox1` and a named `startLoadButton`. 請確定按鈕的事件與`startLoadButton_Click`在此範例中的方法。Make sure that the event for the button is associated with the `startLoadButton_Click` method in this example. 您必須在您的系統上有效的路徑變更影像檔案路徑。You must change the image file path to a path that is valid on your system. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LoadCompleted As AsyncCompletedEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於非同步影像載入作業完成、取消或引發例外狀況時。

span.span: Occurs when the asynchronous image-load operation is completed, been canceled, or raised an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 僅映像載入時以非同步方式使用其中一種，就會發生方法，和是`false`。The occurs only when the image is loaded asynchronously by using one of the methods, and is `false`. 如果藉由呼叫取消影像載入方法屬性會設定為`true`。If the image-load is canceled by calling the method the property of the will be set to `true`. 如果載入程序期間發生例外狀況或錯誤，它會攔截和屬性將包含例外狀況資訊。If an exception or error occurs during the load process, it will be caught and the property of the will contain the exception information. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`PictureBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `PictureBox1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#516](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#516)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#516](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#516)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LoadProgressChanged As ProgressChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於非同步影像載入作業的進度變更之後。

span.span: Occurs when the progress of an asynchronous image-loading operation has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 僅映像載入時以非同步方式使用其中一種，就會發生方法。The occurs only when the image is loaded asynchronously by using one of the methods. 與報告進度百分比的影像載入屬性。The progress percentage of the image load is reported with the property of the . 處理如果您想要反映在非同步影像載入作業的進度或類似的控制項。Handle the if you want to reflect the progress of an asynchronous image-loading operation in a or similar control. 使用屬性更新進度值。Use the property of the to update the progress value. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event. 若要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼包含在 Windows Form名為`pictureBox1`、名為`startLoadButton`，和名為`progressBar1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form that contains a named `pictureBox1`, a named `startLoadButton`, and a named `progressBar1`. 請確定`startLoadButton_Click`方法相關聯按鈕的事件和`pictureBox1_LoadProgressChanged`方法相關聯事件`pictureBox1`。Make sure that the `startLoadButton_Click` method is associated with the event for the button and the `pictureBox1_LoadProgressChanged` method is associated with the event for `pictureBox1`. 您必須在您的系統上有效的路徑變更影像檔案路徑。You must change the image file path to a path that is valid on your system. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::PictureBoxSizeMode SizeMode { System::Windows::Forms::PictureBoxSizeMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::PictureBoxSizeMode value); };
member this.SizeMode : System.Windows.Forms.PictureBoxSizeMode with get, set

summary.span: 指示如何顯示影像。

span.span: Indicates how the image is displayed.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的有效值取自列舉型別。Valid values for this property are taken from the enumeration. 根據預設，在模式中，位於左上角的，和太大的映像的任何部分裁剪。By default, in mode, the is positioned in the upper-left corner of the , and any part of the image that is too big for the is clipped. 使用值導致要放大或縮小為容納影像。Using the value causes the image to stretch or shrink to fit the . 使用值導致延展或縮小以配合影像; 不過，維持原始外觀比例。Using the value causes the image to be stretched or shrunk to fit the ; however, the aspect ratio in the original is maintained. 使用值導致控制項調整大小永遠符合映像。Using the value causes the control to resize to always fit the image. 使用值會讓工作區中的中央映像。Using the value causes the image to be centered in the client area. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到 Windows Form 並呼叫`InitializePictureBoxAndButton`從表單的建構函式或載入事件處理方法的方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializePictureBoxAndButton` method from the form's constructor or Load-event handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode/CS/Form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode/VB/Form1.vb#10)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否同步載入影像。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an image is loaded synchronously.

value.span: 如果同步完成影像載入作業則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if an image-loading operation is completed synchronously; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性`true`表示同步載入影像。Setting the property to `true` means the image is loaded synchronously. 這會造成載入映像之前，從其他輸入遭到封鎖的使用者介面。This causes the user interface to be blocked from other input until the image is loaded. 當是`false`（預設值） 和方法用來載入影像，時，載入指定的映像，以及使用者可以互動的介面，載入程序期間，會顯示映像。When is `false` (the default) and the method is used to load the image, the image is displayed when the specified image is loaded, and the user can interact with the interface during the load process. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼包含在 Windows Form名為`pictureBox1`和名為`startLoadButton`。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form that contains a named `pictureBox1` and a named `startLoadButton`. 請確定按鈕的事件與`startLoadButton_Click`在此範例中的方法。Make sure that the event for the button is associated with the `startLoadButton_Click` method in this example. 您必須在您的系統上有效的其中一個變更影像檔案路徑。You must change the image file path to one that is valid on your system. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers/VB/Form1.vb#3)]
